markdownRemark.html:
I have two different quote pages that I have updated to use the new Spry framework from Adobe.

I am using SOAP based web service calls from my web site to get new quotes, rather than having to reload the page. One of my quote pages is a quote from Steven Wright

I also have a quote from Mr. Spock.

I upgraded my site last year to xhtml, so it made it that much easier to add the Spry framework. Release 1.1 of Spry uses a namespace in the html tag.

"[http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml](http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml)" xmlns:spry="[http://ns.adobe.com/spry](http://ns.adobe.com/spry)">

frontmatter.title: Added Spry Web Service calls to my Quote pages
Adam Lehman presenting at the Tampa ColdFusion User Group tomorrow
